name: Onboarding Assistant
description: Reduce ramp-up time for new team members and customers. This retrieval-augmented Q&A system indexes your internal docs, FAQs and SOPs so users can ask plain-language questions and get accurate answers instantly.
usage: Clone this repository and install dependencies.
Place your documents into the `knowledge_base` folder.
Run the indexing script to build the vector store.
Start the assistant CLI or web server.
Ask questions and get immediate answers.
architecture: Document ingestion and embedding into a FAISS vector store.
Retrieval of relevant chunks based on user queries.
ChatGPT uses the retrieved context to craft precise answers.
Configurable knowledge base: add or remove documents as needed.
